entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending early this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
